name: VirusTotal
description: VirusTotal Integration for File and IP Address Reports via the v3.0 REST API

options.name: Show All File Scanner AV Results
options.description: If checked, the integration will show all AV scanner results for files (hashes) even if the AV scanner did not detect the sample as a positive detection.  Default is to show all results.  Uncheck to only show positive AV detections in the scanner results table.

options.name: Return Unscanned or Unseen Results
options.description: If checked, the integration will return the summary tag "Has not been seen or scanned" if VT has not seen or scanned the indicator before.

options.name: Show Files (Hashes) with No Detections
options.description: If checked, the integration will show results for files that have no positive detections.

options.name: Show IP Addresses with No Detections
options.description: If checked, the integration will show results for IP addresses that have no positive detections.

options.name: Show Domains with No Detections
options.description: If checked, the integration will show results for Domains that have no positive detections.

options.name: Show URLs with No Detections
options.description: If checked, the integration will show results for URLs that have no positive detections.

options.name: API Key Lookup Limit Reached Warning Message
options.description: Displays a warning in the Notification Window if you have reached your VirusTotal API key lookup limit.

options.name: Lookup Throttle Duration
options.description: The amount of time in minutes the integration will throttle your VirusTotal lookups in the event that you hit your lookup limit.  Once throttling has started no lookups for your configured API key will be made until the throttle time has passed.  Defaults to 1 minute.

options.name: Lookup Throttle Warning Message
options.description: If checked, the integration will display a warning message in the overlay window when your VirusTotal lookups are being throttled. Only one message will be shown per throttle duration.

options.name: Maximum number of hashes per lookup request
options.description: Set the maximum number of hashes per lookup that are allowed by your API key (defaults to 4)

options.name: Indicator Blocklist
options.description: Comma delimited list of indicators you do not want looked up.  List is an exact match (URL matches require the scheme).  This option must be set to "Only Admins Can View and Edit".

options.name: Domain and URL Blocklist Regex
options.description: Domains or URLs that match the given regex will not be looked up (if blank, all domains and URLS will be looked up).  Note that the regex does not need to account for the scheme for URLs (i.e., the regex will match against the domain and subdomain of the URL. Do not wrap your regex in forward slashes. This option must be set to "Only Admins Can View and Edit".

options.name: IP Blocklist Regex
options.description: IPs that match the given regex will not be looked up (if blank, all IPs will be looked up).  Do not wrap your regex in forward slashes. This option must be set to "Only Admins Can View and Edit".

options.name: Enable Baseline Investigation Threshold
options.description: If checked, the "Baseline Investigation Threshold Configuration" will be enabled.  Defaults to unchecked.  This option must be set to "Only admins can view and edit".

options.name: Baseline Investigation Threshold Configuration
options.description: Comma delimited list of positive detection rules which can be used to customize the appearance of the positive detection summary tag.  Each rule consists of a number range (e.g., 5-10), followed by a colon and then the message to display.  Rules can optionally include a level of either "warn" or "danger". If the number of positive detections for an indicator falls within a specified range, the configured message is shown in a summary tag.  Default value is "0:No Detections,  1-3:warn:Suspicious - Review,  4-999:danger:Likely Malicious". This option must be set to "Only admins can view and edit".
